label: Pneuma Components (64 DOF)
mathematical_goal: Count the effective degrees of freedom (pneuma components) emerging from G2 compactification
theoretical_significance: The 'pneuma' count (64 DOF) represents the total effective information content of the G2 vacuum: 32 bosonic + 32 fermionic degrees of freedom. This supersymmetric balance is required by G2 holonomy. The number 64 = 2^6 reflects the binary structure of spinor representations. In PM, this replaces the legacy xi ~ 10^10 parameter with a geometrically-derived integer.
